步骤条节点可额外设置副标题及描述信息。.en-us: Step bar nodes can set additional subtitles and descriptions.

步骤图标可传入任意组件型内容。.en-us: Step icons can be passed in any component type content.

通过设置参数`percent`控制当前步骤的环状进度显示效果。.en-us: Set the parameter `percent` to control the current step circular progress display effect.

通过参数`current`可控制当前步骤条所在步骤。.en-us: By the parameter `current`, you can control the current step in the step bar.

从上往下垂直展示步骤条信息。.en-us: Display step bar information vertically from top to bottom.

垂直展示步骤条信息.en-us: Vertical display of step bar information

通过参数`labelPlacement`可控制步骤条额外信息的展示形式。.en-us: By the parameter `labelPlacement`, you can control the display format of step bar extra information.

简洁风格的点状步骤条。.en-us: A step bar with a simple style.

设置参数`allowClick=True`后可直接点击步骤进行步骤切换。.en-us: Set the parameter `allowClick=True` to allow direct step switching.

通过回调函数监听并控制步骤条功能。.en-us: Listen to the callback function and control the functionality of the step bar.
